title: Commercial building for sale in Matale Town
details:
12.6 perches
4 storeys
2100 sqft each floor
Basement parking for 6 cars and 15 motorcycles
Main road frontage to A9 highway
All 4 floors currently occupied by 2 blue chip companies in SL with LKR 500k monthly income from rent.

Asking price LKR 175 million
